attributes.action: reject the total removal of my country, England from records
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I accuse you of removing England as a National Entity from the European geographical map and supplanting it with a spurious location in the EU. We English do not want Arc Manche region or any other name based on subterfuge for the political ends resulting in the total  sovietisation of a European Police State.
